column4: I'm trying to install vmware-server on ubuntu 7.10 x86_64 and it told me it cant find the "more" command anyone know the package i need to install or where it can be located? I asked in vmware but it is dealing with the disto more is a general function in any distro
I'm trying to install vmware-server on ubuntu 7.10 x86_64 and it told me it cant find the "more" command anyone know the package i need to install or where it can be located?
thats really weird.. try just 'more' in the terminal? Normally 'more' and 'less' call the same command.
could be your path is set weirdly --> /bin/more  is where mine is at
